title: Scrumptious BBQ spare ribs
ingredients: ['4 racks pork ribs', '2 (450g) bottles BBQ sauce', '3 tablespoons tomato sauce', '3 teaspoons English mustard', '340g honey', '3 teaspoons paprika', '3 teaspoons garlic powder', '2 teaspoons chilli flakes, or to taste', '2 teaspoons salt, or to taste', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste', '50ml water']
